website_summaries.verdict: Speed Queen's TR7 washing machine doesn't clean nearly well enough to recommend it to anyone.
pros: Speed Queen's $1,049 TR7 top-load washer has a straightforward display panel that's pretty easy to use
cons: It earned the worst stain removal score we've seen in five years of testing washing machines
It has a small capacity and an outdated design

customer_reviews.title: Just another rave review.....
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know the last washing machine on the planet that lets you own it rather than it owning you. Purchased after reading scores of nothing but rave reviews. You can add mine to them. Purchased from 1 Stop Camera and Appliance, a pleasant transaction with folks that seem to "get" that the customer likes to stay informed of how the process is proceeding. Wonder if I will ever experience this level of customer service again.
customer_reviews.author: Deliberate

customer_reviews.title: A great dryer, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This washer washes clothes well. Isn't that the point after all? The control panel is very very easy to use, well thought out, intuitive. All metal construction. Speed Queen quality. All the options you might want.
customer_reviews.author: Upgrade Taos Computers

customer_reviews.title: Maybe this one will be the new Maytag...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but only had it working for less than a month. With washing machines, the test is will they last 10 years or more. Our last Maytag only lasted about 5 years—an expensive disappointment for eqpmt we had trusted for most of our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Epinc

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: The price is well worth it! Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N Garringer

customer_reviews.title: Best washing machine ever!
customer_reviews.text: Clothes smell fresh and are almost dry at the end of the cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B. Email

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This Speed Queen is replacing a 20 year old Kenmore washer that was slowly dying. Everything works perfectly, and it really seems to be a better washer then the one I had. I like the touch panel and the simplicity of this washer. Ordering from Amazon goes smoother then ordering elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: janice399

customer_reviews.title: Made in the U.S.A
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine. Our last washing machine lasted 26 years, and I hope this one will last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: it's a good deal. Expect it at least 2 weeks later ...
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to get delivered. If you've got the time, it's a good deal. Expect it at least 2 weeks later than they tell you. I like the machine though.
customer_reviews.author: Grrdog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans clothes with water! Clothes never been cleaner. Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: One of the best washing machines out there.
customer_reviews.text: My washer made it to Oregon undamaged and in great shape. It was delivered late, but not through any fault of the seller. Winter storms played a role in that. The washer is a well made unit and I am very pleased with this purchase. I would recommend this product for durability and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hale

customer_reviews.title: ***Beware! Online Speed Queen sales are void of factory warranty***
customer_reviews.text: Speed Queen only honors the warranty if purchased through a local dealer. All sales from a non-local online retailer void the warranty. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Speed Queen is not the cheapest, but it is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an almost new Whirlpool that was stupid. It took all day to do one load because it got confused and quit. (sensing) I only wanted a Speed Queen based on reputation. I bought mine new from a store. It's the greatest washer ever. The electronic touch buttons bring a 5 year warranty. It was only $20 more than the manual knobs. I push the button, it says "come back in 29 minutes" and 29 minutes later it's done. My Whirlpool was so bad I was going to the Laundromat and spending $5 a load to do clothes. Yeah, Speed Queen is not the cheapest, but it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Allen S

customer_reviews.title: It is not flashy or cool looking, but its built like a tank and fast!
customer_reviews.text: Our 23-year-old Kenmore Elite top loader stopped working due to an electronic problem. We searched reviews to find our new washing machine and chose the Speed Queen. First of all its a commercial grade machine designed for home use and to support this claim, they have a 5-year bumper to bumper warranty. It is not flashy or cool looking, but its built like a tank and fast. The downside is its drum is smaller than we would prefer. However, we chose reliability over cosmetics, and the price point was acceptable. Bottom line we are happy and this machine washes our clothes exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great washer
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 15 yo Fisher and Paykel with the SQ. Has great warranty, lots of features. Seems little noisier than my old one and doesn't spin as fast as the FP (1000 rpms is unique to FP I believe). Easy access for repairs with removable front panel. Had to flush my drain pipe of buildup as this machine pumps water out much faster, ended up backing up onto floor with first wash. Stainless steel tub vs plastic in my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible at cleaning your clothes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine does not clean at all please watch some you tube videos on it before you buy you will see for your self how terrible of a washer it is if you still want a speed queen try looking at the new TC5 it looks to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: jb1186

customer_reviews.title: Hate it! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate my speed Queen set. The washer is loud, as is the dryer! The dryer takes forever to dry clothes and supposedly the washer spins more than other brands so not sure why that is. I researched and supposedly this is the best but I beg to differ. Too many things to list about what I do NOT like. I had an Electrolux before and it beats this hands down. So so disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Ronda M. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Best Machine I Have Had in 20 Years
customer_reviews.text: Happiest day in my house for a long time. This washer is back in time. Lets you select everything and doesn't go off balance and shut down. Replaced a GE machine that could not do a load of towels without going off balance and shutting down. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Twoblindmen

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I've had machine for a month and had to be serviced twice.... Called Speed Queen to ask if they would replace this lemon.... They said no way and were very nasty... implying you bought it your stuck with it.... My advice is stay away..... I even had trouble finding someone to come service the machine.... They were ten miles away and I was told they don't come in my area.... BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: 30 minute loads!!
customer_reviews.text: 30 minutes loads!!!!! Blow through laundry so much faster. I wish I had this 15 years ago with my 4 kids. Please just stop shopping and by this! This machine is a beast!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Belford

customer_reviews.title: tell alliance two tips from an old buzzard
customer_reviews.text: We have used it for 3 wash days now...what a super machine-most importantly, the wife likes the quickness of the cycles. Please tell the manfacturer to put a glass lid on the 92, then you can scope the suds etc without opening the lid. Also, on the matching dryer, place a door stop to keep the door from swinging out too far; possibly a rubber door check to stop the door at 90 degrees
customer_reviews.author: stiz1937wiz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic pump part.
customer_reviews.text: Warranty is 3 years. It should be 5 years. I have had it 4 years and needed 3 service calls this year. The belt broke. The cheap plastic pump broke. Speed Queen salesmen and Speed Queen claims to be well made. Cheap parts. Poor design small items can get caught between tubs. I bought it because I did not want a water saver wash machine. That it is good for. The belts break most often due to a frozen pump. Also, this machine was made too heavy and is ridiculously difficult to move.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Love my speed queen 9 series
customer_reviews.text: Finally a new washer that can clean clothes and do it in half an hour! None of this half cup of water and running for 120 minutes BS as with the new HE machines. Does not go out of balance, rinses great, cleans clothes, durable and easy to service. What more could you ask? Also, you can use ECO mode on this machine and chose second rinse option and it overrides the spray rinse and provides a submersion rinse. This lets you use fabric softener in the normal/Eco mode if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Rancho Guy 4

customer_reviews.title: Speed queen sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I really can’t imagine what machine all these five star reviewers are using! That’s the one I wanted when I ended up with this crappy speed queen. The thing smells like rot and all the clothes I wash in it smell as if I washed them in a swamp. Then there’s the service calls...6 in 3 years. I would never recommend this brand to anyone I liked.
customer_reviews.author: James D Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare Custome Service
customer_reviews.text: Worst Customer service ever. If the machine came with a problem or defect from the fabric, they take months to resolve this and meanwhile you have to wash your clothes somewhere. Never again I will purchase Speed Queen again. This machines are more expensive and breaks like any other brands, but with the same amount of money you can have one with 10 years warranty and better repair service, if breaks or doesn't work well for a few consecutive times. Unfortunately they did not mention that in the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow - just like in the old days - my clothes are clean again!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! - a washer that washes! - American made! - 5 year warranty! No more high efficiency low water smell! My clothes are less wrinkled and clean! Thank you Speed Queen! I will recommend to everyone I know. And to the US Government - stay out of my laundry room!
customer_reviews.author: kinfire75

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: Fills all the way with water, great performance, made to last 25 years includes 5 year parts and labor full in home warranty- mad in USA. 6 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crb

customer_reviews.title: not happy, took 45 min to dry to half way ...
customer_reviews.text: not happy,took 45 min to dry to half way small load of T-s,and socks. Using eco cycle,and to dry completely add another 45 min of cycle...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving my speed queen
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but my clothes are cleaner. I love my speed queen top load TR7. It’s so quiet and you can get some sleep while it’s running a load of laundry. I feel like I should have bought one of these a long time ago and said hell no to the plastic throw away washers that I once owned. Anyways if you want a good washer then buy a speed queen and say hell no to the other competitors. One more thing I didn’t buy from amazon. Bought mine from a local dealer
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williamson-Miller

product_meta.title: Speed Queen TR7000WN 26 Inch Top Load Washer with 3.2 cu. ft. Capacity, 8 Wash Cycles, 840 RPM, Extreme Tested Electronic Controls in White
product_meta.description: The Speed Queen 26" 3.3 cu. ft. Top-Load Washer is designed, built and tested to deliver commercial-grade performance. It features a 210-degree agitator with 60 strokes per minute, providing maximum water-to-laundry contact. It also features tubs that spins during the draining process, preventing dirt from lingering in the wash. The three temperature settings make sure your clothes suffer no damage when the proper temperature is selected. There are bleach and fabric softener dispensers which distributes those items itself when it gets to that point of the cycle. An extra-rinse option lets you rest assured that your garments have been thoroughly cleansed of dirt and soapy residue. The outer appearance of the unit is a clean white. Available at AppliancesConnection.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars61 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
